title: Araburu Kisetsu no Otome-domo yo. (O Maidens in Your Savage Season)
synopsis: When they were little kids laughing and playing together, Izumi Norimoto and Kazusa Onodera were like siblings. But as their bodies matured into middle school, Kazusa began seeing him as something different; unfortunately for her, so did the other girls. Ostracized, Kazusa had no choice but to distance herself from him going into high school. After joining the literature club, however, she finds friends that keep her mind occupied. Known throughout the school for reading aloud sex scenes in literature novels, the club's reputation has kept all teachers from accepting the task of being their adviser.
characters: ['Onodera, Kazusa', 'Sonezaki, Rika', 'Hongou, Hitoha', 'Sugawara, Niina', 'Sudou, Momoko', 'Amagi, Shun', 'Juujou, Sonoe', 'Yamagishi, Tomoaki', 'Norimoto, Izumi', 'Saegusa, Hisashi']
